subject: Status on my pedals
description_text:
My order number is SSN4956 I was wondering the status on it, it says
confirmed but I was wondering if there was some more info as to if it was
forgotten or back ordered or shortage or whatnot. Any info helps!

Sincerely,
Casey Hulme
513-926-2777
casey.hulme07@gmail.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Casey Hulme,    Please provide your order number and a description of the issue, and we will assist you in checking it.

My order number is SSN4956. The issue is that I placed the order over a
week ago and there has been no update on its status. Just wondering if it
is backordered or you are out of stock or something else. Thank you

On Mon, Dec 22, 2025 at 6:50 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi Casey Hulme,  The goods arrived at our warehouse yesterday, and we have shipped your order today via FedEx. Please keep an eye on the tracking information. We sincerely apologize for the delay; due to the peak season, the entire logistics process has experienced some delays.

Thank you for the update! Hopefully you get everything sorted I know the
holiday season can be a little crazy! Thank you again!

On Wed, Dec 24, 2025 at 23:02 support@simsonn.com
Hi Casey Hulme,  I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I see your package has been delivered. Have you received it?  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=887406952211
